Scenario1-D2C_CreditCard_Payment.TC-1: GIVEN Valid Credit-Card Details,WHEN requesting to make Payment THEN should get Successfully Processed Payment.
Scenario1-D2C_CreditCard_Payment.TC-2: Validation of EnrolleeId & RequestReferenceId Status in the response.
